theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Sensory Neuron-Mediated Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on sensory neuron regulation of lifespan via modulation of insulin/IGF-1 signaling, emphasizing neuroendocrine and environmental cue integration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Sensory Neuron-Mediated Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes sensory neuron-derived insulin-like peptides modulating IIS pathway and aging, highlighting neuroendocrine control of longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Sensory Neuron-Mediated Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes evolutionary conservation of GH/IGF-1/insulin pathway including sensory regulation aspects influencing lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Sensory Neuron-Mediated Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Includes neuroendocrine IGF1 roles in cell fate and aging, with links to sensory and systemic signaling affecting longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on GH/IGF-1 axis effects on lifespan, sexual dimorphism, and trade-offs between cancer protection and cardiovascular risks.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes lifespan extension and healthspan improvement via GH/IGF-1 reduction, with links to caloric restriction and disease modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights somatopause, lifespan extension by reduced GH/IGF-1 signaling, and protection from age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on lifespan effects of altered IGF1 levels, SOCS2 regulation, and GH/IGF-1 signaling balance impacting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses genetic mutations reducing GH/IGF-1 signaling and their shared anti-aging mechanisms with calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes lifespan extension via GH-IGF-1 axis suppression and improved glucose-insulin metabolism mimicking calorie restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers evolutionary conservation of GH-IGF-1 signaling in longevity, oxidative stress resistance, and life-history trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on GH/IGF-1/insulin endocrine regulation of metabolism, oxidative stress, reproduction, and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores GH receptor mutations, insulin signaling, and calorie restriction interactions affecting longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details GH/IGF-1 axis role in aging, insulin sensitivity, and lifespan effects of GH deficiency or overexpression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes GH receptor disruption effects on aging, calorie restriction mediation, and insulin sensitivity as longevity mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on GHR gene disruption, insulin sensitivity despite obesity, and systemic aging effects of GH/IGF-1 signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Modulation of Lifespan and Disease Trade-offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses optimal GH-IGF-1 levels for survival, immune system involvement, and disease prevention in lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes GH/IGF-1 axis role in aging via developmental gene programs and specific signaling proteins like JUN, STAT, SHC1.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights neuroendocrine regulation of aging by GH/IGF-1 axis and genetic perturbations mimicking calorie restriction effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on Ames dwarf mice with GH/IGF-1 axis mutations affecting systemic aging and age-related pathology.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes GH/IGF-1 deficiency effects on cerebrovascular and brain aging, linking hormonal decline to tissue-specific aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details sex-specific modulation of GH/IGF-1 axis by 17α-Estradiol affecting hepatic IGF1 and aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on serum IGF-1 decline during aging, timing-dependent effects on health span, and GH/IGF-1 dual roles in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: GH/IGF-1 Axis Developmental and Signal Transduction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores pleiotropic effects of GH/IGF-1 on aging, caloric restriction-induced endocrine adaptations, and paracrine vs endocrine IGF-1.
